content: Crash Market Games are short, time-based prediction pools. Players choose UP or DOWN for a selected asset before a countdown ends. Smart contracts handle outcomes and payouts instantly, with no house and full transparency.

Every game you play earns you jackpot tickets. For every 1,000 G Coin wagered, you get 1 ticket. There are daily, weekly, monthly, and annual jackpots — with winners chosen transparently using Random.org.
Be The Boss is a turnkey Web3 business opportunity. Launch your own branded gaming portal and earn 50% commissions on G Coin purchases and game fees. No coding needed — fully automated on blockchain.

G Coin is the native utility token powering the entire PlayW3 portal. It's used for gameplay, rewards, affiliate commissions, and partner revenue sharing. G Coin is not an investment and cannot be used as fiat.
Developers can build directly on PlayBlock using our SDK and API. Launch custom games, integrate player wallets, and tap into a live Web3 player base. Full documentation and support available.
PvP Sports Trading lets you predict outcomes of live sports events against other players. Place bets with G Coin and win instantly based on results — all managed on-chain through smart contracts.
Looking for general info? The FAQ covers everything from signing up, using G Coin, earning jackpots, referral rewards, and understanding our partner program.
